title: [BUG] SVGs with multiple path tags fail to render after updating from 2.80.4 to 2.88.x
body:
**Description**

Without any changes to our code and the same svg's, svg's with multiple path tags appear just fine on 2.80.4 but don't appear on 2.88.x

**Code**

I have created a dummy xamarin app just for android, but we have the same issue with iOS with our app. I created a git repo for it here [https://github.com/fverdou/SkiaSharpIssue](https://github.com/fverdou/SkiaSharpIssue)

**Expected Behavior**

Well not exactly "expected" as I don't know if this is an actual bug or if we need to change our code for it to work properly with 2.88.x versions.

**Actual Behavior**

When I had 2.80.4 versions of SkiaSharp and SkiaSharp.Views.Forms the result was this:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40397896/224068462-0fec671a-202a-426b-891a-a6e2ba84bc2d.png)
But after updating to 2.88.3 this is the result without changing anything in the code:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40397896/224068652-d7051c30-58ad-48e8-b2d8-676e76983710.png)
You can see in the embedded resources the difference. The working svg has only one path tag but the other has multiple.

Reverting back to 2.80.4 made both SVGs render again like in the first picture.

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.x 
- Last known good version:  2.80.4
- IDE:  Visual Studio Community 2022 (64-bit) Version 17.5.1
- Platform Target Frameworks:
  - Android: Android 13.0 API Level 33
- Target Device: Huawei Mate 9 model MHA-L09 with 9.1.0 EMUI and Android 9
  
<details>
  
```

(I don't know what to add here. If you need more info let me know)

```
</details>
